title: The castell of comforte in the whiche it is euidently proued, [that] God alone absolueth, and freli forgeueth the sinners of so many as vnfaynedly repent, and turne vnto hym Lately compyled by Thomas Becon.
author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Ihon Daye, dwellinge in Aldersgate, and William Seres, dwellinge in Peter Colledge,
